Key Match Events: Trent Boult picked 3 wickets in the first powerplay against Sri Lanka
Kusal Perera brought up his half century in just 22 balls but was dismissed by Lockie Ferguson
Others: Boult had taken 3 wickets in the first powerplay in his last 8 matches
Sri Lanka lost their 5th wicket in the powerplay while Kusal Perera was continuing with his rampaging innings
